# recipientVehicleID

**Instance Property**

The vehicle to receive the action request.

## Declaration

```swift
let recipientVehicleID: String
```

## Discussion

This string is the same one that appears in the [doc://com.apple.CarKey/documentation/CarKey/VehicleReport/identifier] property of one of the session’s vehicle reports.

## Getting the Action Details

- **functionID**: The vehicle-specific code that identifies which feature you want to control.
- **actionID**: The vehicle-specific code that identifies what action to take on the targeted feature.
